sentences.english: And you fixed them up with the plasters in your first-aid kit.
sentences.chinese: 你用急救箱中的橡皮膏治好了它。

sentences.english: Leaving home in a hurry, he forgot to bring his first-aid kit.
sentences.chinese: 他匆忙离家，竟忘了带上急救箱。

sentences.english: Keep at least one first-aid kit in your home and one in your car.
sentences.chinese: 至少在你家里和车上各准备一个急救箱。

sentences.english: There should be a drug list and drug-using records in the first aid kit.
sentences.chinese: 急救箱应有一份药品清单和用药记录。

sentences.english: I keep a first-aid kit in the trunk of my car.
sentences.chinese: 我总是在车子的后备箱里准备一个急救箱。

sentences.english: I want a small first-aid kit.
sentences.chinese: 我要买一个小的急救箱。

sentences.english: Bring a first aid kit just in case.
sentences.chinese: 带上一个急救箱吧，以防万一。

sentences.english: You'd better bring a first-aid box.
Our firemen came, of course, complete with rescue equipment, first aid kit, etc.
sentences.chinese: 当然，消防队员来了，带有救援器械和医疗急救箱等。

sentences.english: First aid kit and manual. Keep a first aid kit at home and in your car.
sentences.chinese: 在家里和车里准备一个急救箱。

sentences.english: Familiarize yourself with basic first-aid treatment and the location of the first-aid box.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉基本急救护理并确记急救箱的存放处。

sentences.english: Bring me a first-aid box, will you? I think it'll be useful.
sentences.chinese: 给我拿个急救箱来好吗？我想它将会有用。

sentences.english: They hold the handles and the back seat. Her mother carries a first-aid box on the shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 他们握住车把和车后座，妈妈肩上还背着急救箱。

definition: variant of 包紮|包扎[bao1 za1]
to wrap up/to pack/to bind up (a wound)
